name: Paper Wizard
description:
Big update v1.1 !

Dual stick shooter RPG ! Paper Wizard !
Save the Paperians' world, Booktopia with your thumbs!

■ Wizards and monsters with papercraft art styles
■ Dual stick control : movement & basic skill

FEATURES
-------------
■ Magic skills of fire, ice and lightning
■ 2 basic skills
■ Beautiful dungeons
■ Papercaft monsters
■ Over 150 items


STORY
---------
One day the greatest calamity in history came upon the land of Booktopia. The deadly darkness lasted for many days over the Paperians. Wizards who gathered at the West Tower of Magic became aware that the Magic Book of Light, that had been keeping the cloud of darkness coming of Booktoria, had gone missing. Together with it was gone the Great Wizard Shreddder, who was the keeper of the Magic Book of Light. According to his disciples, Shreddder was said to have headed to the Dungeon of Darkness, leaving the message that he was going there to experiment a new magic.

Darkness rapidly covered the skies of Booktopia and there was not a moment to loose. The Wizards Alliance selected three prospective young wizards and gave them the mission of finding and bringing back the Magic Book of Light.

The brave young wizards headed towards the armed with the magical skills of fire, ice and lightning.

Meanwhile, at the dungeon of darkness, Dupulika the Wizard of Darkness had succeeded in luring Shreddder over to the dark side. Dupulika ordered Shreddder to create dark spells and raise an evil army of darkness.

Once Booktopia's skies were totally covered with the dark clouds, the evil army of darkness was to invade Booktopia.
The Paperians' destiny were in the three young wizards.

CAUSION
------------
This game may perform poorly on older generation phone.


Featuring Music by Matthew Pablo
